official-title.#text: To condition the provision of premium and cost-sharing subsidies under the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act upon a certification that a program to verify household income and other qualifications for such subsidies is operational, and for other purposes.

attestation-date.#text: Passed the House of Representatives September 12, 2013.

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: and no reductions in cost-sharing shall be allowed under

external-xref.#tail: of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: that there is in place a program that successfully and consistently verifies, consistent with

text.#text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, no premium tax credits shall be allowed under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: section 1402 of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act

header.#text: Conditioning provision of ACA premium and cost-sharing subsidies upon certification that a program to verify household income and other qualifications for those subsidies is operational
